page.title: 01Meriden-Heart of England.
page.content:
Meriden lies between the cities of Birmingham and Coventry in a very pleasant rural area.
Tradition has it that the village lies at the centre of England, hence the area is often called {The Heart of {England.
The village is surrounded by typical Warwickshire countryside, the area is important for agriculture and there are many farms around the village.
Many footpaths exist in the area, one of which is the Heart of England Way, so walkers and ramblers are a common sight in the area.
